{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:42.720
    | text      = That one, I think, is the first one that I've really found
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:45.439
    | text      = bewildering.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:46.800
    | text      = I think we should set a character limit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:49.519
    | text      = Ha, ha, ha, ha, ha, ha.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:52.759
    | text      = Pre-Twitter, too.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:54.040
    | text      = 140.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:54.920
    | text      = Not doing this 280 shit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:56.240
    | text      = Here's what we're going to do.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:57.639
    | text      = Only one dependent clause.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:59.199
    | text      = Ha, ha, ha, ha, ha.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:02.279
    | text      = And also, for some reason, no split infinitives.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:04.519
    | text      = Sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:05.040
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:05.800
    | text      = So Jordan, we're going to start off this show.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:07.839
    | text      = This is going to be a little bit of a shorter episode
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:10.040
    | text      = because there's not a ton that happens,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:13.120
    | text      = but some stuff that is definitely worth discussing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:15.560
    | text      = Excellent.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:16.120
    | text      = And I found very interesting.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:17.680
    | text      = But you know, a good section of the episode
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:20.160
    | text      = is Alex talking to Larry Pratt from Gun Owners for America.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:24.680
    | text      = And legit, it's just, wah, I love guns.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:27.680
    | text      = Yeah, they like guns.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:28.560
    | text      = There's nothing interesting going on.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:30.120
    | text      = It's just like, well, Bush is going
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:31.759
    | text      = to renew the assault weapons ban.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:33.720
    | text      = Hooray!
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:34.519
    | text      = He didn't.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:35.019
    | text      = Boo!
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:35.519
    | text      = Yay!
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:36.399
    | text      = Boo!
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:36.899
    | text      = Yeah, making people afraid of something
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:38.600
    | text      = that doesn't end up happening.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:39.959
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:40.680
    | text      = And so it's kind of pointless.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:42.000
    | text      = Fair.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:42.519
    | text      = But Alex does have some things to say that are kind of relevant
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:47.839
    | text      = to the situation we find ourselves in today.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:49.800
    | text      = Interesting.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:50.319
    | text      = He is very worried about an article
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:53.040
    | text      = that he read that has to do with a scientist declaring
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:56.439
    | text      = that the end of the world, or the apocalypse,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:58.839
    | text      = is a 50-50 chance.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:00.199
    | text      = Ha, ha, ha, ha!
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:02.879
    | text      = That's a good article.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:03.879
    | text      = He believes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:05.120
    | text      = It either happens or it doesn't, 50-50.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:07.639
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:08.160
    | text      = Alex believes that the most likely scenario
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:11.040
    | text      = for the end of the world is the release of a super bio weapon.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:17.040
    | text      = Interesting.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:17.879
    | text      = Yes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:18.399
    | text      = OK.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:19.040
    | text      = And some of the support for why he thinks this
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:22.040
    | text      = is a little dodgy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:23.279
    | text      = OK.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:24.079
    | text      = And then the really dangerous thing,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:25.600
    | text      = the thing that I think is the greatest threat,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:27.480
    | text      = and they mentioned a bunch of other things in this article
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:29.860
    | text      = that we'll get into later in the next segment,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:33.480
    | text      = is genetic engineered pathogens getting turned loose.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:38.079
    | text      = And we know that porting down bio weapons
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:41.399
    | text      = lab over in the United Kingdom in Wiltshire
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:46.160
    | text      = produces and has level four status, and is underground,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:51.240
    | text      = and has three rings of barbed wire around it minefields.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:55.040
    | text      = But that didn't stop four years ago from someone releasing
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:59.560
    | text      = weaponized foot and mouth.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:01.839
    | text      = Of course, two months before it showed up
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:03.800
    | text      = in over a dozen locations simultaneously,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:07.040
    | text      = that's not how natural outbreaks behave.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:09.319
    | text      = They don't show up in Scotland, and Wales,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:11.240
    | text      = and Northern Ireland in the same week by accident.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:16.759
    | text      = But to go back, porting down bio weapons lab
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:19.480
    | text      = had contacted the different counties in the United Kingdom
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:24.000
    | text      = and told them, prepare masses of fire, prepare masses of wood.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:29.079
    | text      = They don't have a lot of woods in England.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:30.800
    | text      = I remember it was a very expensive undertaking,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:32.759
    | text      = the article said.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:33.679
    | text      = They masked all these pyres.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:36.240
    | text      = They said, prepare for some type of large outbreak,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:38.480
    | text      = perhaps foot and mouth.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:40.000
    | text      = Then suddenly, foot and mouth showed up.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:42.759
    | text      = And porting down said, we think an animal rights
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:45.159
    | text      = activist stole this out of our lab, and it got released.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:50.639
    | text      = That's 13 monkeys.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:52.000
    | text      = OK, let's buy their story that an animal rights
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:54.279
    | text      = activist stole it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:55.080
    | text      = How did an animal rights activist
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:56.519
    | text      = get into an underground base guarded by the army?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:00.039
    | text      = Real fast, none of that is true.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:01.600
    | text      = I was going to say, that sounds bononkers.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:04.039
    | text      = Yeah, we talked about this foot and mouth issue
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:07.360
    | text      = in a previous 2003 episode, so I'm not going
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:09.440
    | text      = to repeat all that stuff here.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:11.200
    | text      = But there's one detail in that telling of the story
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:13.799
    | text      = that I've not heard Alex include in the narrative in the past.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:16.399
    | text      = Interesting.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:17.120
    | text      = In previous times, I've heard him talk about this.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:19.679
    | text      = I've not heard Alex say that porting down claimed
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:22.519
    | text      = that an animal rights activist broke in and stole
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:25.080
    | text      = the foot and mouth, which then got released.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:27.279
    | text      = Yeah, Bruce Willis claimed that that happened.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:29.720
    | text      = That is an interesting wrinkle.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:31.840
    | text      = Also, by the way, another detail that's just absurd
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:35.240
    | text      = that he doesn't usually include is that porting down
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:38.200
    | text      = called these farms and told them,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:40.679
    | text      = get ready for an outbreak.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:43.639
    | text      = Yeah, that one was interesting.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:44.960
    | text      = That's nonsense.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:45.720
    | text      = We talked about what the reality of that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:47.519
    | text      = is on a previous episode.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:48.879
    | text      = That was like the Ministry of Agriculture.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:51.799
    | text      = They do that every year.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:53.000
    | text      = They call and say, hey, are you prepared
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:55.639
    | text      = for possible sick animals?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:58.279
    | text      = So there's a real problem with the chain of events
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:01.080
    | text      = that Alex is expressing that's immediately apparent, which
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:06.240
    | text      = is that an animal rights activist supposedly
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:08.240
    | text      = went on a bizarre, almost certainly impossible mission
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:11.080
    | text      = of stealing this virus just so they could release it and kill
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:13.639
    | text      = animals in the name of protecting animal rights.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:16.559
    | text      = Duh.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:17.279
    | text      = It doesn't make sense from the standpoint
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:19.039
    | text      = of an animal rights activist.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:20.240
    | text      = It makes perfect sense.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:21.759
    | text      = So porting down never said that an animal rights activist
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:24.720
    | text      = had released the foot and mouth.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:26.480
    | text      = This is what The Guardian refers to as a, quote, rural myth.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:30.440
    | text      = And here's the basic story.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:32.440
    | text      = There's an animal sanctuary called
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:34.000
    | text      = the Hillside, which is home to over 800 rescued animals
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:37.000
    | text      = from farms.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:38.399
    | text      = Some representatives from the Hillside
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:40.159
    | text      = visited a farm called Burnside Farm, which
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:42.440
    | text      = happened to be one of the main farms where animals came down
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:45.399
    | text      = with foot and mouth.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:46.799
    | text      = They were not the only ones to visit, though.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:48.639
    | text      = There was an inspection by the Ministry of Agriculture,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:51.360
    | text      = having received multiple complaints
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:52.879
    | text      = about the conditions that animals
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:54.240
    | text      = were kept on the farm.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:56.440
    | text      = After the foot and mouth outbreak began,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:58.639
    | text      = the folks at Burnside leveled accusations
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:00.919
    | text      = at Hillside sanctuary workers of having
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:03.279
    | text      = been the source of the outbreak.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:04.879
    | text      = But that's pretty much impossible.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:07.000
    | text      = The Hillside folks came to the farm in December 2000,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:09.919
    | text      = and the outbreak occurred in February 2001.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:12.919
    | text      = In January 2001, the Ministry of Agriculture
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:15.240
    | text      = did their inspection and said, quote,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:17.080
    | text      = there were positively no traces of foot and mouth
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:19.759
    | text      = in the pigs in the farm.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:21.720
    | text      = For their part, a spokesman at Port and Down
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:24.000
    | text      = actually said, quote, we have never worked on foot and mouth.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:28.399
    | text      = That was their response, not that animal rights activists
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:30.879
    | text      = said that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:31.360
    | text      = Interesting response from them as compared to what Alex
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:34.559
    | text      = said that their response was.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:35.960
    | text      = Yeah, definitely.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:36.720
    | text      = That was very fascinating, one of which was in a movie,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:39.039
    | text      = and the other one was like, we don't do that here.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:42.039
    | text      = Alex is creating a fake way to present this rural rumor
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:44.919
    | text      = as if it were the actual response of the people
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:47.279
    | text      = at Port and Down.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:48.559
    | text      = Any critical thinkers listening to his show
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:50.320
    | text      = should be asking themselves why he would do that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:53.559
    | text      = Certainly one possibility is that Alex just
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:55.399
    | text      = doesn't know anything, and he's mixing up rural rumors
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:58.240
    | text      = with official statements from Port and Down.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:00.879
    | text      = He could be that stupid, and if so, I
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:02.679
    | text      = would say he's probably not someone
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:04.080
    | text      = who should be taken seriously.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:05.519
    | text      = On the other hand, another possibility
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:07.399
    | text      = is that Alex knows exactly what he's doing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:09.840
    | text      = If Port and Down had claimed that an animal rights
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:12.000
    | text      = activist stole the virus, that solidifies
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:14.159
